description:
Ultra-fast Windows theme switcher

ThemeToggle is a lightweight, ultra-fast Windows theme switcher that toggles between Light and Dark modes in just 10-15ms.

Features:
- Sub-15ms execution time (imperceptible, <1 video frame @ 60fps)
- Hotkey support via silent VBScript launchers
- Scheduled automation (sunrise/sunset theme changes)
- Stubborn app detection (~14 common apps explicitly handled)
- Windows 10 and 11 optimized with version-specific APIs
- Multi-monitor taskbar support
- No dependencies, fully portable

Perfect for users who want instant, reliable theme switching without the bloat of larger applications.
Distribution and packaging update:
- NSIS installer with optional shortcuts/startup/scheduled tasks
- Unified release pipeline (dist/build-release.bat)
- WinGet manifest updater (dist/update-winget.ps1)
- Consolidated silent launchers (dist/launchers)
- Documentation refresh for release steps

No runtime behavior changes; performance remains 10-15ms.

See full changelog at: https://github.com/espensev/ThemeToggle/blob/main/docs/RELEASE_NOTES.md
